TITLE.LOCALISED_TEXT: ボガーダンのヘルカイト

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: When Bogardan Hellkite enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.
Quando il Nibbio Infernale di Bogardan entra nel campo di battaglia, infligge 5 danni suddivisi a tua scelta tra un qualsiasi numero di creature e/o giocatori bersaglio.
Wenn der Bogardanische Höllendrache ins Spiel kommt, fügt er 5 Schadenspunkte zu, deren Aufteilung auf eine beliebige Anzahl an Kreaturen und/oder Spielern deiner Wahl du bestimmst.
Quand l’Escouflenfer du Bogardân arrive sur le champ de bataille, il inflige 5 blessures réparties comme vous le voulez entre n’importe quel nombre de cibles, créatures et/ou joueurs.
Cuando el Engendro de Bogardan entre al campo de batalla, hace 5 puntos de daño divididos como elijas entre cualquier número de criaturas y/o jugadores objetivo.
ボガーダンのヘルカイトが戦場に出たとき、望む数のクリーチャーかプレイヤー（またはその組み合わせ）を対象とする。ボガーダンのヘルカイトは、それらに５点のダメージを好きなように割り振って与える。
When Bogardan Hellkite enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.
Когда Богарданский Змей выходит на поле битвы, он наносит 5 повреждений, разделенных по вашему выбору между любым количеством целевых существ и (или) игроков.
Quando Dragão Avérneo de Bogardan entra no campo de batalha, ele causa 5 pontos de dano distribuídos à sua escolha entre qualquer número de criaturas e/ou jogadores alvo.
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:SetFilterType( FILTER_TYPE_CARDS + FILTER_TYPE_PLAYERS ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ENEMY_ONLY, EffectController() ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetEquivalenceDepth(5)
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION:
local i=0 while MTG():EffectDataChest():Get_Targets(i) ~= nil do local target_chest = MTG():EffectDataChest():Get_Targets(i) local target_card = target_chest:Get_CardPtr(0) local target_player = target_chest:Get_PlayerPtr(0) if target_card ~= nil or target_player ~= nil then local damage_to_deal = 1 local j = i+1 while MTG():EffectDataChest():Get_Targets(j) ~= nil do
if target_card ~= nil then if target_card == MTG():EffectDataChest():Get_Targets(j):Get_CardPtr(0) then damage_to_deal = damage_to_deal+1 MTG():EffectDataChest():Get_Targets(j):Set_CardPtr(0, nil) end elseif target_player ~= nil then if target_player == MTG():EffectDataChest():Get_Targets(j):Get_PlayerPtr(0) then damage_to_deal = damage_to_deal+1 MTG():EffectDataChest():Get_Targets(j):Set_PlayerPtr(0, nil) end end
j=j+1 end
local source = EffectSource() if source == nil then source = Object() end
if target_card ~= nil then target_card:DealDamage( damage_to_deal, source ) elseif target_player ~= nil then target_player:DealDamage( damage_to_deal, source ) end end i=i+1 end
